 Radio hacking will be at 11 o'clock. If you don't realize this is a newbie track, I guess
you're a little bit more lost than the rest of us. I was the first to come up with a newbie
track a couple of years ago. The idea of the newbie track is not to insult people, but
the talks at DEF CON were getting more abstract and more technical. It was getting hard to
understand one year's track and see if I followed the previous year's track. So I established
a new track just so for introductions, new ideas, and perhaps things that shouldn't be
